name: strapi-provider-upload-aws-s3-use-cdn
description: Expands on the standard @strapi AWS S3 provider package to enable uploading to private S3 buckets by removing the public ACL requirement and allowing settings to be configured for S3 subdirectories. It also allows a CDN base URL to be set since the public S3 image URLs will be disabled.
author: Jared Shepherd
